task.title: View Defined Datasets
task.shortdesc: View the list of defined datasets on the Manage Datasets page.

context.p: To see what datasets have already been defined:

step.cmd: Open the Manage Datasets page, by clicking the Datasets icon in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The Manage Datasets page opens, listing the datasets that have already been defined.

If the has not made the dataset available to you, you will not be authorized to execute it. In this case, the dataset is marked (not authorized). If you need to see this data, you must ask the add you to the list of users who can access the dataset.
If the dataset has expired, the dataset is marked (expired). If you need to see this data, you must ask the to reset the dataset expiry date.
